outages_by_date.title: Outages by date
outages_by_date.sql: select strftime('%Y-%m-%d', created_at) date, COUNT(zone) from outages group by date order by date limit 101

outages_by_region_and_date.title: Outages by region and date
outages_by_region_and_date.sql: select region, COUNT(zone), strftime('%Y-%m-%d', created_at) date from outages group by date, region order by date, region limit 101
